text:
@KLoeffler Way to let your state bring up the rear on getting on the “stay at home” order.
Your governor claimed he JUST RECENTLY found out that Covid-19 can be transmitted by someone before they show symptoms. You were in on the intelligence briefings. How did you not pass that info on ?
